title: Commercial property market value in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2012 to 2016
summary: This statistic shows the value of the value billion in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2012 to 2016 and visualises the predicted 'ageing UK ' _ .
Over the 20 Year period , the value billion is expected to increase by 1.7 years , the largest increase predicted between 2014 and 2015 at 138 years .
gold: This statistic illustrates the value of the commercial property market in the United Kingdom ( UK ) from 2012 to 2016.
It can be seen that in 2016 the commercial property market reached a value of 883 billion British pounds .
